Understate: The claim may understate the extent to which ProtestJobs.com and similar websites have been debunked or exposed as hoaxes, as it suggests that ProtestJobs.com simply "quietly petered out" without acknowledging the broader context of its lack of credibility.
Falters at times: The claim falters in providing a clear and accurate representation of the nature and legitimacy of ProtestJobs.com, as it fails to acknowledge the evidence suggesting it is a fake or satirical website.
